name: What's the word? Pick it!
description:
What's the word? Play with your friends together to guess the word! Multiple letters will be given with random order. You neeed to pick out right letters in right order as quickly as possible. The one who picks out more words will be winner. Invite your facebook and google+ friends to play ! You can also challenge players from all over the word!

If you're word mania, don't miss it!
